= TPJCustomConsoleApp =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

This is the base class for _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_. It implements all the functionality of that class, but declares all properties as protected. For details of the main properties, methods and events see the documentation for _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

If you intend to sub-class _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_ you should subclass _TPJCustomConsoleApp_ instead and publish just those properties you wish to expose.
_TPJCustomConsoleApp_ has two protected virtual methods that can be overidden in decendants if required.

== Protected Methods ==

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| _[TPJCustomConsoleAppDoComplete DoComplete]_ || Triggers the _[TPJConsoleAppOnComplete OnComplete]_ event. ||
|| _[TPJCustomConsoleAppDoStart DoStart]_ || Triggers the _[TPJConsoleAppOnStart OnStart]_ event.<br>_This method is only available in v2.0 or later._ ||
|| _[TPJCustomConsoleAppDoWork DoWork]_ || Triggers the _[TPJConsoleAppOnWork OnWork]_ event. ||
